mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT ACC_GRP ACC_GRP FROM FCM0006M WHERE ACC_GRP = 'VM11' OR ACC_GRP = 'VM02' OR ACC_GRP = 'VM03'
SELECT SAP_CNTY_S_CODE CODE, SAP_CNT_NAME NAME FROM FCM0030C ORDER BY SAP_CNT_NAME
SELECT CODE CODE, NAME NAME FROM SYS0004M WHERE IS_SAP = 1 ORDER BY CODE
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CLM_NO_CNT FROM FCM0004M WHERE APPV_REQ_KEY_NO = #{newReqNo}

SELECT 'V1' || TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'yymm') || MAX(CLM_NO) AS CLM_NO FROM ( SELECT NVL (TO_CHAR (MAX (SUBSTR (CLM_NO, 7, 4) + 1), 'FM0000'), '0001') AS CLM_NO FROM FCM0002M WHERE SUBSTR (CLM_NO, 3, 4) = TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'yymm')
UNION ALL
SELECT NVL (TO_CHAR (MAX (SUBSTR (VENDOR_REQ_NO, 7, 4) + 1), 'FM0000'), '0001') AS CLM_NO FROM FCM0029D WHERE SUBSTR (VENDOR_REQ_NO, 3, 4) = TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'yymm') )
SELECT A.VENDOR_REQ_NO FROM FCM0029D A INNER JOIN FCM0004M B ON A.APPV_PRCSS_NO = B.APPV_PRCSS_NO

SELECT TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'yyyy') || NVL (TO_CHAR (MAX (SUBSTR (APPV_PRCSS_NO, 5, 6) + 1), 'FM000000'), '000001') AS APPV_PRCSS_NO FROM FCM0004M WHERE SUBSTR (APPV_PRCSS_NO, 1, 4) = TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'yyyy')
SELECT MEM_CODE FROM ORG0001D where mem_id = #{memId}

SELECT APPR_MEM_CODE FROM FCM0023M WHERE APPR_MEM_STUS = '1'
AND J1 <> '0'
AND J2 <> '0'
AND J3 <> '0'
AND J4 <> '0'
AND J5 <> '0'
AND J6 <> '0'
AND J7 <> '0'
AND J8 <> '0'
AND J9 <> '0'
AND R1 <> '0'
AND BULK_J1 <> '0'
AND R2 <> '0'
AND A1 <> '0'
AND V1 <> '0'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT VENDOR_REG_NO_NRIC FROM FCM0029D UNION SELECT VENDOR_REG_NO_NRIC FROM FCM0031D) WHERE VENDOR_REG_NO_NRIC = #{regCompNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT VENDOR_REG_NO_NRIC, PAY_TERM FROM FCM0029D UNION SELECT VENDOR_REG_NO_NRIC, PAY_TERM FROM FCM0031D) WHERE VENDOR_REG_NO_NRIC = #{regCompNo} AND PAY_TERM = #{paymentTerms}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT VENDOR_REG_NO_NRIC, PAY_TERM, BANK FROM FCM0029D UNION SELECT VENDOR_REG_NO_NRIC, PAY_TERM, BANK FROM FCM0031D) WHERE VENDOR_REG_NO_NRIC = #{regCompNo} AND PAY_TERM = #{paymentTerms} AND BANK = #{bankList}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT VENDOR_REG_NO_NRIC, PAY_TERM, BANK, BANK_ACC_NO FROM FCM0029D UNION SELECT VENDOR_REG_NO_NRIC, PAY_TERM, BANK, BANK_ACC_NO FROM FCM0031D) WHERE VENDOR_REG_NO_NRIC = #{regCompNo} AND PAY_TERM = #{paymentTerms} AND BANK = #{bankList} AND BANK_ACC_NO = #{bankAccNo}

SELECT VENDOR_ACC_ID FROM (SELECT VENDOR_REG_NO_NRIC, PAY_TERM, BANK, BANK_ACC_NO, VENDOR_ACC_ID FROM FCM0029D UNION SELECT VENDOR_REG_NO_NRIC, PAY_TERM, BANK, BANK_ACC_NO, VENDOR_ACC_ID FROM FCM0031D) WHERE VENDOR_REG_NO_NRIC = #{regCompNo} AND PAY_TERM = #{paymentTerms} AND BANK = #{bankList} AND BANK_ACC_NO = #{bankAccNo}
SELECT VENDOR_REQ_NO FROM FCM0029D WHERE VENDOR_REQ_NO = #{newReqNo} AND VENDOR_REG_NO_NRIC = #{regCompNo}
SELECT CODE_DESC FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_MASTER_ID = '343' AND CODE = SUBSTR(#{newReqNo}, 1, 2)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS0092M VALUES ( SYS0092M_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{code}, #{codeName}, #{reqNo}, #{appvStus}, #{rejctResn}, #{reqstUserId}, '1', SYSDATE, #{userId}, SYSDATE, #{userId} )
mapper.update: MERGE INTO FCM0005D A USING ( SELECT APPV_PRCSS_NO, MAX(APPV_LINE_SEQ) APPV_LINE_SEQ, #{memCode} APPV_LINE_USER_ID FROM FCM0005D WHERE APPV_PRCSS_NO = #{appvPrcssNo} GROUP BY APPV_PRCSS_NO, #{memCode} ) SRC ON (A.APPV_PRCSS_NO = SRC.APPV_PRCSS_NO AND A.APPV_LINE_SEQ = SRC.APPV_LINE_SEQ AND A.APPV_LINE_USER_ID = SRC.APPV_LINE_USER_ID) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( APPV_PRCSS_NO, APPV_LINE_SEQ, APPV_LINE_USER_ID, APPV_STUS, CRT_DT, CRT_USER_ID, UPD_DT, UPD_USER_ID ) VALUES ( SRC.APPV_PRCSS_NO, (TO_NUMBER(SRC.APPV_LINE_SEQ) + 1), #{memCode}, 'T', SYSDATE, #{userId}, SYSDATE, #{userId} )
mapper.select: SELECT T1.VENDOR_REQ_NO ,T1.VENDOR_ACC_ID ,T1.VENDOR_GRP ,T1.COST_CENTER ,T1.COST_CENTER_NAME ,T1.VENDOR_NAME ,T1.VENDOR_REG_NO_NRIC ,T1.PAY_ADV_EMAIL1 ,T1.PAY_ADV_EMAIL2 ,T1.ADD_HOUSE_LOT_NO ,T1.ADD_STREET ,T1.ADD_POSTAL_CODE ,T1.ADD_CITY ,T1.ADD_COUNTRY ,T1.BANK_COUNTRY ,T1.BANK ,T1.BANK_ACC_HOLDER ,T1.BANK_ACC_NO ,T1.BANK_BRANCH ,T1.SWIFT_CODE ,T1.CONTACT_DESIGNATION ,T1.CONTACT_NAME ,T1.CONTACT_PHONE_NO ,T1.CONTACT_EMAIL ,T1.PAY_TERM ,T1.PAY_TYPE ,T1.PAY_OTH ,T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID ,T1.APPV_PRCSS_NO ,T1.REM ,T1.UPD_DATE ,T2.USER_NAME AS USER_NAME FROM FCM0029D T1 LEFT JOIN SYS0047M T2 ON T1.CRT_USER_ID = T2.USER_ID WHERE T1.VENDOR_REQ_NO = #{reqNo}
SELECT T3.* ,NVL(T2.USER_NAME, '') AS USER_NAME FROM FCM0031D T3 LEFT JOIN SYS0047M T2 ON T3.CRT_USER_ID = T2.USER_ID WHERE T3.VENDOR_ACC_ID = #{vendorAccId}

SELECT T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID ,T1.ATCH_FILE_ID ,T2.ATCH_FILE_NAME ,T2.FILE_SUB_PATH ,T2.PHYSICL_FILE_NAME ,T2.FILE_EXTSN ,T2.FILE_SIZE FROM SYS0070M T1 LEFT JOIN SYS0071D T2 ON T1.ATCH_FILE_ID = T2.ATCH_FILE_ID WHERE T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID = #{atchFileGrpId} ORDER BY T1.ATCH_FILE_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITF0110M SELECT FN_CRT_IFKEY('110') AS IF_KEY, '1' SEQ, '110' IF_TYPE, '10' TRAN_STATUS_CD, '' ERR_CD, '' ERR_MSG, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') TRAN_DT, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS') TRAN_TM, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') RGST_DT, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS') RGST_TM, 'BAT_110' RGST_ID, VENDOR_ACC_ID CUST_NO, VENDOR_NAME CUST_NM, VENDOR_GRP CUST_GROUP, ADD_POSTAL_CODE ZIP_CD, ADD_COUNTRY COUNTRY, '' KONZS, '' ADDR1, '' ADDR2, '' LOCATE_CD, '' KUNNR, '' LIFNR, '' BIZ_KEY, '' PROCAN_YN, '' PG_ID, '' IF_REM, '' BIZ_DT, '' BIZ_TM, VENDOR_REG_NO_NRIC STENR, VENDOR_REQ_NO ALTKN, SUBSTR(ADD_HOUSE_LOT_NO, 0,10) HOUSE_NUM1, SUBSTR(ADD_STREET, 0,35) STREET, ADD_CITY CITY, PAY_ADV_EMAIL1 EMAIL_01, PAY_ADV_EMAIL2 EMAIL_02, BANK_COUNTRY BANKS, BANK BANKL, BANK_ACC_NO BANKN, BANK_ACC_HOLDER KOINH, '' BANKA, '' STRAS, '' ORT01, '' BRNCH, '' BGRUP, SWIFT_CODE SWIFT, CASE WHEN (VENDOR_GRP = 'VM02') THEN '0022200300' WHEN (VENDOR_GRP = 'VM03') THEN '0022200100' WHEN (VENDOR_GRP = 'VM11') THEN '0022200400' ELSE '' END AKONT FROM FCM0029D WHERE APPV_PRCSS_NO = #{appvPrcssNo}
mapper.select: SELECT ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID, MAX(ATCH_FILE_ID) ATCH_FILE_ID FROM SYS0070M WHERE ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID = ( SELECT ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID FROM FCM0029D WHERE VENDOR_REQ_NO = #{clmNo} ) group by ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID
SELECT SYS0070M_ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
SELECT SYS0071D_ATCH_FILE_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS0070M SELECT #{newFileAtchGrpId}, #{newFileAtchId}, CHENAL_TYPE, CRT_USER_ID, SYSDATE, UPD_USER_ID, SYSDATE FROM SYS0070M WHERE ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID = #{exFileAtchGrpId} AND ATCH_FILE_ID = #{exFileAtchId}

INSERT INTO SYS0071D SELECT #{newFileAtchId}, ATCH_FILE_NAME, FILE_SUB_PATH, PHYSICL_FILE_NAME, FILE_EXTSN, FILE_SIZE, FILE_PASSWORD, FILE_UNQ_KEY, FILE_KEY_SEQ FROM SYS0071D WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = #{exFileAtchId}

INSERT INTO FCM0029D( VENDOR_REQ_NO, VENDOR_ACC_ID, VENDOR_GRP, COST_CENTER, COST_CENTER_NAME, VENDOR_NAME, VENDOR_REG_NO_NRIC, PAY_ADV_EMAIL1, PAY_ADV_EMAIL2, ADD_HOUSE_LOT_NO, ADD_STREET, ADD_POSTAL_CODE, ADD_CITY, ADD_COUNTRY, BANK_COUNTRY, BANK, BANK_ACC_HOLDER, BANK_ACC_NO, BANK_BRANCH, SWIFT_CODE, CONTACT_DESIGNATION, CONTACT_NAME, CONTACT_PHONE_NO, CONTACT_EMAIL, PAY_TERM, PAY_TYPE, PAY_OTH, ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID, /*APPV_PRCSS_NO*/ REM, CRT_USER_ID, CRT_DATE, UPD_USER_ID, UPD_DATE, PREV_CLM_NO ) SELECT #{newClmNo} VENDOR_REQ_NO, VENDOR_ACC_ID, VENDOR_GRP, COST_CENTER, COST_CENTER_NAME, VENDOR_NAME, VENDOR_REG_NO_NRIC, PAY_ADV_EMAIL1, PAY_ADV_EMAIL2, ADD_HOUSE_LOT_NO, ADD_STREET, ADD_POSTAL_CODE, ADD_CITY, ADD_COUNTRY, BANK_COUNTRY, BANK, BANK_ACC_HOLDER, BANK_ACC_NO, BANK_BRANCH, SWIFT_CODE, CONTACT_DESIGNATION, CONTACT_NAME, CONTACT_PHONE_NO, CONTACT_EMAIL, PAY_TERM, PAY_TYPE, PAY_OTH, #{newFileAtchGrpId}, /*APPV_PRCSS_NO,*/ REM, CRT_USER_ID, SYSDATE, UPD_USER_ID, SYSDATE, VENDOR_REQ_NO FROM FCM0029D WHERE VENDOR_REQ_NO = #{clmNo}

INSERT INTO FCM0029D( VENDOR_REQ_NO, VENDOR_ACC_ID, VENDOR_GRP, COST_CENTER, COST_CENTER_NAME, VENDOR_NAME, VENDOR_REG_NO_NRIC, PAY_ADV_EMAIL1, PAY_ADV_EMAIL2, ADD_HOUSE_LOT_NO, ADD_STREET, ADD_POSTAL_CODE, ADD_CITY, ADD_COUNTRY, BANK_COUNTRY, BANK, BANK_ACC_HOLDER, BANK_ACC_NO, BANK_BRANCH, SWIFT_CODE, CONTACT_DESIGNATION, CONTACT_NAME, CONTACT_PHONE_NO, CONTACT_EMAIL, PAY_TERM, PAY_TYPE, PAY_OTH, ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID, /*APPV_PRCSS_NO*/ REM, CRT_USER_ID, CRT_DATE, UPD_USER_ID, UPD_DATE, PREV_CLM_NO ) SELECT #{newClmNo} VENDOR_REQ_NO, VENDOR_ACC_ID, VENDOR_GRP, COST_CENTER, COST_CENTER_NAME, VENDOR_NAME, VENDOR_REG_NO_NRIC, PAY_ADV_EMAIL1, PAY_ADV_EMAIL2, ADD_HOUSE_LOT_NO, ADD_STREET, ADD_POSTAL_CODE, ADD_CITY, ADD_COUNTRY, BANK_COUNTRY, BANK, BANK_ACC_HOLDER, BANK_ACC_NO, BANK_BRANCH, SWIFT_CODE, CONTACT_DESIGNATION, CONTACT_NAME, CONTACT_PHONE_NO, CONTACT_EMAIL, PAY_TERM, PAY_TYPE, PAY_OTH, #{newFileAtchGrpId}, /*APPV_PRCSS_NO,*/ REM, CRT_USER_ID, SYSDATE, UPD_USER_ID, SYSDATE, VENDOR_REQ_NO FROM FCM0029D WHERE VENDOR_REQ_NO = #{clmNo}
